Masimphuthando ntini (amụrụ n'abalị asaa nke ọnwa Julaị 2000) bụ onye n'eme egwuregwu Kricket South Africa
N'ọnwa Ogustu 2018, Cricket South Africa nyere ya nnukwu ọrụ nkwekọrịta tupu oge egwuregwu 2018-19
Ọ bụ nwa onye otu egwuregwu kricket mbụ bụ Makhaya ntini
Ọ mere mpụta iri abụo mbụ bụ Twenty20 ya maka Western Province na 2018 Africa T20 Cup n'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Septemba  afọ 2018
Tupu mmalite T20 ya, ọ bụ onye nsonye nke ndị otu South Africa maka 2018 Under-19 Cricket World Cup
O mere ndepụta mpụta mbụ maka Western Province na 2018–19 CSA Provincial One-Day Challenge n'abali iri nke ọnwa Febrụwarị afọ  2019
O mere mpụta izizi klas ya maka Western Province na 2018–19 CSA 3-Day Provincial Cup n'abalị́ iri na anọ nke ọnwa Febrụwarị 2019
N'onwa Septemba 2019, akpọrọ aha ya na ndị otu Western Province maka 2019–20 CSA Provincial T20 Cup
N'ọnwa April 2021, a kpọrọ Ntini aha na South Africa Emerging Men's squad maka njem egwuregwu isii ha gara na Namibia
Ka emechara otu ọnwa ahụ, akpọrọ ya aha na ndị otu KwaZulu-Natal, tupu oge egwuregwu kricket afọ 2021–22 na South Africa
